snippet.title: The Horde gameplay (PC Game, 1994)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for The Horde, Dos PC game produced by Crystal Dynamics in 1994 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/the-horde/1507/
Watching the intro and playing a few turns of this strategy/action game.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Litil Divil - https://youtu.be/ICukEMx3ucw
Gex - https://youtu.be/168zpTs3bJE
Putty Squad - https://youtu.be/PhOc-54IaEM
